Package com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.actions

Interface Summary
Action The base building block of a template.
ActionBody The body of an action.
ActionContribution Contributes to an action.
ActionContributionFactory Creates an action contribution.
ActionContributionOptions Ways in which an action contribution can contribute to an action.
ActionFactory Creates an action.
ActionParameter A parameter of an action.
ContainerAction<T> An action that creates or finds an object and makes it available to its body.
DynamicallyParameterisable Implemented by actions that are created by the default action factory and support dynamic parameters.
 

Class Summary
AbstractAction Reduces the effort it takes to implement the Action interface and offers some convenience methods.
AbstractContainerAction<T> Implements the ContainerAction interface by obtaining the container object, making it available, and giving child actions the opportunity to use it.
AbstractDynamicallyParameterisableAction An abstract action that allows dynamic parameters, which it stores and offers to its subclasses.
ActionContributionInformation Provides information about an action contribution.
ActionInformation Provides information about an Action.
ActionParameterInformation Provides information about the parameter of an action.
CompoundActionParameter An action parameter that is composed of other action parameters.
ConstantActionParameter An action parameter with a constant value.
ContributingAction An action that makes an action contribution.
ContributingActionFactory Creates actions that, when executed, make an action contribution.
DefaultActionContributionFactory An action contribution factory that's based on a action contribution class and examines it to retrieve information about it.
DefaultActionContributionOptions A default action contributions options implementation that keeps track of all chosen options, so that they can be applied to an action context.
DefaultActionFactory An action factory that takes an action class and examines it to collect information about it.
ExpressionActionParameter An action parameter with a value that is based on the evaluation of an expression.
 

Exception Summary
ActionException Thrown by actions when their execution fails.
